kDesc
Gothic red and black patent leather boots. This is part of the 'The Morbids: China Doll' clothing set. [#Legal]
Des bottes gothiques noires et rouges. Intégré au lot de vêtements "The Morbids : Poupée chinoise." [#Legal]
Schwarzrote Lacklederstiefel im Gothic-Stil. Dieser Gegenstand gehört zum Kostümset 'The Morbids: Porzellanpuppe'. [#Legal]
Stivali di pelle verniciata rossi e neri. Fanno parte del set d'abbigliamento 'The Morbids: Bambola di porcellana'. [#Legal]
Botas de charol góticas color rojo y negro. Es parte de la gama de ropa de “Los macabros: muñeca de porcelana”. [#Legal]
ゴシックな赤と黒のレザーブーツ。[#Legal]
고딕풍의 빨강색과 검은색 특허를 받은 가죽 부츠. 이 아이템은 '모비드: 도자기 인형' 의상 세트 중 일부입니다. [#Legal]
Gothic red and black patent leather boots. This is part of the 'The Morbids: China Doll' clothing set. [#Legal]
哥特風格的紅黑色漆皮靴子。這是「恐怖使者：中國娃娃」服裝組的一部分。 [#Legal]
